name: lastfm
description: Retrieve data from last.fm about a users scrobbling history

options.name: current
options.description: Returns yours or another users last scrobbled song

options.name: user
options.description: The user to receive scrobble information for (defaults to you)

options.name: search
options.description: Search for a last.fm profile to see what its last scrobbled song was

options.name: username
options.description: The last.fm username you'd like to search

options.name: username
options.description: The last.fm username you'd like to set

options.name: clear
options.description: Clears your last.fm username from the database
